summary: CRM system completely down for all users
description: The CRM system is completely unavailable. Users are receiving connection refused errors when attempting to access the application.

summary: CRM loading slowly for sales team
description: Sales representatives report that the CRM is taking 30+ seconds to load each page. This is impacting their ability to update customer records efficiently.

summary: CRM search function not returning results
description: Users cannot search for customer records. The search function appears to be working (no errors) but returns no results regardless of query.

summary: CRM unable to process new orders for EMEA region
description: Sales representatives in Europe, Middle East and Africa regions cannot process new orders through the CRM. Order submission results in a timeout error.

summary: Single user unable to log into CRM
description: One user from the marketing department cannot log into the CRM system. Other users on the same team are unaffected.

summary: CRM integration with ERP system failing
description: The data integration between CRM and ERP systems is failing. Orders are not being passed to the ERP system for fulfillment. This is affecting all regions.

summary: CRM reporting module not generating daily reports
description: The automated daily reports from the CRM system have not been generated for the past 24 hours. This affects executive dashboards and automated distribution lists.
